effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon.  This effect wears off after the trainer takes 100 steps.
effect_entries.short_effect: For 100 steps, prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party's lead Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
１００歩　進む　あいだ
弱い　野生の　ポケモンが
まったく　でて　こなくなる。

An item that prevents any low-level
wild Pokémon from jumping out at
you for 100 steps after its use.

Strumento che evita l’incontro con i Pokémon
selvatici deboli per 100 passi dopo l’utilizzo.

Repele Pokémon salvajes débiles en un recorrido
de 100 pasos.

Hält 100 Schritte lang schwache, wilde
Pokémon ab.

Repousse les Pokémon sauvages faibles pendant
100 pas.

100보 걸어가는 동안
약한 야생 포켓몬이
전혀 나오지 않게 된다.

１００ぽ　すすむ　あいだ
よわい　やせいの　ポケモンが
まったく　でて　こなくなる。

An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 100 steps
after its use.

Pokémon from appearing for 100 steps
after its use.

Repousse les Pokémon sauvages
faibles pendant 100 pas.
